snippet: Justice Barry Kamins comes from a political world but is legally bound to stay out of it, despite his friendship with the former District Attorney Charles Hynes of Brooklyn.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column says New York State Justice Barry Kamins is legally bound to stay out of politics, despite his friendship with former Brooklyn District Atty Charles Hynes; notes city's Department of Investigation says Kamins used his office to boost career of Hynes, who is accused of misusing public funds.
lead_paragraph: Justice Barry Kamins comes from a political world but is legally bound to stay out of it, despite his friendship with the former District Attorney Charles Hynes of Brooklyn.

headline.main: Blurred Lines Between Duty and Friendship
headline.print_headline: Blurred Lines Between Duty and Friendship
